title: You broke Zed
body:
On a bad day I can generally deal with Zed mid quite easily, but now I don't even see him as anything more than a bot.

I actually let him hit me with his shuriken, both of them if he wishes, and don't bother to try and stop him doing anything, I just farm away and when I feel like it, if he doesn't run, I just kill him. No issues with his combos, no issues with his ult.

I don't get this patch, AT ALL. All you done with Zed was fix his combo so he can't wombo combo you, so unless I am coming across shit Zed's, he is broken like most of the game now.

vi is the least of most peoples concerns atm lol

Lol had 10-0 win ratio with ranked Vi. She's pretty broken.

Can't actually peel since she just barrows through your team and decimates ur ADC because if her teams behind her and they focus you, they're all sitting ducks and your knockaside makes a few of them sitting ducks to some extent anyway if your team follows up ur engage well enough  - then with their follow up - even if they have tried to peel you from the carry, your team gets a big follow up for free. I mean it's a catch 22, be a sitting duck or counter-engage on the enemy team and leave ur carry to Vi (not a good idea) but I guess you could always just run and leave them or tell him to sell a BT and buy Zhonya's so he's not chunked to half / 1/3rd HP with one R-E-Q-E smite).
